languages.text: "Если бы я тебе ее дал, все стало бы слишком просто. Когда ты уходишь, мне нравится гадать — увижу ли я тебя в следующий раз целиком или по кускам. Не лишай меня этой радости".

traits.locale_text: "Если бы я тебе ее дал, все стало бы слишком просто. Когда ты уходишь, мне нравится гадать — увижу ли я тебя в следующий раз целиком или по кускам. Не лишай меня этой радости".

languages.text: "If I gave you that, it would all be too easy for you. When you leave, I'll enjoy wondering if next time I see you, it'll be in one piece or several. Don't spoil my fun."
languages.original_text: "Если бы я тебе ее дал, все стало бы слишком просто. Когда ты уходишь, мне нравится гадать — увижу ли я тебя в следующий раз целиком или по кускам. Не лишай меня этой радости".

traits.locale_text: "If I gave you that, it would all be too easy for you. When you leave, I'll enjoy wondering if next time I see you, it'll be in one piece or several. Don't spoil my fun."
"If I gave you that, it would all be too easy for you. When you leave, I'll enjoy wondering if next time I see you, it'll be in one piece or several. Don't spoil my fun."
"If I gave you that, it would all be too easy for you. When you leave, I'll enjoy wondering if next time I see you, it'll be in one piece or several. Don't spoil my fun."
"If I gave you that, it would all be too easy for you. When you leave, I'll enjoy wondering if next time I see you, it'll be in one piece or several. Don't spoil my fun."

languages.text: “如果真的这样，那对你来说恐怕就太容易了。等你走的时候，我会兴奋地猜想，我下次见到的会是完整的你，还是被大卸八块的你。别破坏了我的乐趣。”
languages.original_text: "If I gave you that, it would all be too easy for you. When you leave, I'll enjoy wondering if next time I see you, it'll be in one piece or several. Don't spoil my fun."

traits.locale_text: “如果真的这样，那对你来说恐怕就太容易了。等你走的时候，我会兴奋地猜想，我下次见到的会是完整的你，还是被大卸八块的你。别破坏了我的乐趣。”

languages.text: «Si te diera eso, te estaría poniendo las cosas demasiado fáciles. Cuando te vayas, disfrutaré preguntándome si volverás de una pieza o en varias. No vas a estropearme la diversión».
languages.original_text: "If I gave you that, it would all be too easy for you. When you leave, I'll enjoy wondering if next time I see you, it'll be in one piece or several. Don't spoil my fun."

traits.locale_text: «Si te diera eso, te estaría poniendo las cosas demasiado fáciles. Cuando te vayas, disfrutaré preguntándome si volverás de una pieza o en varias. No vas a estropearme la diversión».

languages.text: 「そんなことをしたら貴様には簡単すぎる。今度貴様を見た時は生身のまま戻ってくるか、細切れの肉片になっているか…それをを肉片になっているかもしれない。私の娯楽の一種だ、楽しみを奪うでない」
languages.original_text: "If I gave you that, it would all be too easy for you. When you leave, I'll enjoy wondering if next time I see you, it'll be in one piece or several. Don't spoil my fun."

traits.locale_text: 「そんなことをしたら貴様には簡単すぎる。今度貴様を見た時は生身のまま戻ってくるか、細切れの肉片になっているか…それをを肉片になっているかもしれない。私の娯楽の一種だ、楽しみを奪うでない」

languages.text: "Würde ich Euch das geben, wäre es zu leicht für Euch. Wenn Ihr geht, werde ich freudig rätseln, wie ich Euch wohl wiedersehen werde — unversehrt oder in vielen Stücken. Verderbt mir den Spaß nicht."
languages.original_text: "If I gave you that, it would all be too easy for you. When you leave, I'll enjoy wondering if next time I see you, it'll be in one piece or several. Don't spoil my fun."

traits.locale_text: "Würde ich Euch das geben, wäre es zu leicht für Euch. Wenn Ihr geht, werde ich freudig rätseln, wie ich Euch wohl wiedersehen werde — unversehrt oder in vielen Stücken. Verderbt mir den Spaß nicht."

languages.text: « Si je vous fournissais l'équipement nécessaire, la tâche serait bien trop facile. Quand vous partirez, je savourerai le suspense en me demandant comme je vous retrouverai à votre retour : en un seul morceau ou en pièces ? N'allez pas gâcher mon plaisir. »
languages.original_text: "If I gave you that, it would all be too easy for you. When you leave, I'll enjoy wondering if next time I see you, it'll be in one piece or several. Don't spoil my fun."

traits.locale_text: « Si je vous fournissais l'équipement nécessaire, la tâche serait bien trop facile. Quand vous partirez, je savourerai le suspense en me demandant comme je vous retrouverai à votre retour : en un seul morceau ou en pièces ? N'allez pas gâcher mon plaisir. »

languages.text: "İstediğini verirsem senin için fazla kolay olur. Bir sonraki görüşmemize kaç parça hâlinde geleceğini görmek istiyorum. Eğlenceme mani olma."
languages.original_text: "If I gave you that, it would all be too easy for you. When you leave, I'll enjoy wondering if next time I see you, it'll be in one piece or several. Don't spoil my fun."

traits.locale_text: "İstediğini verirsem senin için fazla kolay olur. Bir sonraki görüşmemize kaç parça hâlinde geleceğini görmek istiyorum. Eğlenceme mani olma."
